notes_text: Illegal since 1925 but use is widespread. Convictions for personal use are rare. Formerly a plant of high status with several documented medicinal uses in ancient times.
notes: Illegal since 1925 but use is widespread. Convictions for personal use are rare. Formerly a plant of high status with several documented medicinal uses in ancient times.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Egypt}} Illegal since 1925<ref>{{citation |url = http://sensiseeds.com/en/blog/cannabis-egypt |title = Cannabis in Egypt |publisher = The Sensi Seed Bank |author = Seshata |work = Sensi Seeds Blog |date = 27 December 2013 |access-date = 20 January 2014 |archive-date = 29 June 2019 |archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20190629104604/https://sensiseeds.com/en/blog/cannabis-egypt/ |url-status = live }}</ref> but use is widespread. Convictions for personal use are rare.<ref>{{citation |url = http://blogs.abcnews.com/theworldnewser/2010/05/egypts-pot-problem-a-marijuana-shortage.html |title = Egypt's Pot Problem? A Marijuana Shortage |publisher = [[ABC News (United States)|ABC News]] |last = Hasan |first = Lama |date = 5 May 2010 |access-date = 31 January 2011 |url-status = dead |archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20110301233324/http://blogs.abcnews.com/theworldnewser/2010/05/egypts-pot-problem-a-marijuana-shortage.html |archive-date = 1 March 2011}}</ref> Formerly a plant of high status with several documented medicinal uses in ancient times.
